description.p: Weapon (shortsword), very rare (requires attunement by a good-aligned creature)
A glowing silver blade etched with celestial runes.
Deals an extra 1d6 radiant damage on a hit.
When you hit a fiend or undead, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution save or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
Once per long rest, you can cast Lesser Restoration or Cure Wounds (3rd level) through the sword.
A thin, blackened dagger that seems to absorb sound.
Attacks made with this dagger cannot be heard (even magical sound detection).
Grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide immediately after making an attack with it.
Once per long rest, you can cast Silence centered on the dagger (lasts concentration, up to 10 minutes).
